mapper.insert: insert into CreditExchange (ceID, ceStat, memID, mcID, ceWays, ceItem, ceAmount, ceCost, ceAdress, ceTime) values (#{ceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cestat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mcid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ceways,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ceitem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ceamount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cecost,jdbcType=REAL}, #{ceadress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update CreditExchange
ceStat = #{cestat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memID = #{memid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mcID = #{mcid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ceWays = #{ceways,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ceItem = #{ceitem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ceAmount = #{ceamount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ceCost = #{cecost,jdbcType=REAL},
ceAdress = #{ceadress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ceTime = #{cetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ceID = #{ceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
